Events that occurred on 19 August

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1916 â€“ J.R.R. Tolkien and G.B. Smith meet at Acheux.
1920 - Composer Paul Kont is born.
1966 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes letter 289a.
1973 - Mythcon 4 in Santa Barbara, California.
1991 - Scholar Taum Santoski dies of cancer at the age of 32.
1992 - Tolkien Centenary Conference, a combination of Oxonmoot 1992 and Mythcon 23, at Keble College, Oxford.
2000 - Mythcon 31 in Hawaii.
2012 - The Return of the Ring, Tolkien Society conference at Loughborough University, England.
2022 - The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power (Season One: Amazon Original Series Soundtrack) is released.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
Legolas and Gimli visit the Glittering Caves.
